info.title: BlockchainManagementClient
info.description: REST API for Azure Blockchain Service

get.description: Get details about a blockchain member.

parameters.name: blockchainMember
parameters.description: Payload to create a blockchain member.

parameters.name: blockchainMember
parameters.description: Payload to update the blockchain member.

get.description: Lists the blockchain members for a resource group.
Lists the blockchain members for a subscription.
Lists the consortium members for a blockchain member.

post.description: Lists the API keys for a blockchain member.
Regenerate the API keys for a blockchain member.
To check whether a resource name is available.
Lists the available consortiums for a subscription.

get.description: Lists the available operations of Microsoft.Blockchain resource provider.
Lists the Skus of the resource type.
Get the details of the transaction node.

put.description: Create or update the transaction node.

parameters.name: transactionNode
parameters.description: Payload to create the transaction node.

parameters.name: transactionNode
parameters.description: Payload to create the transaction node.

get.description: Lists the transaction nodes for a blockchain member.

post.description: List the API keys for the transaction node.
Regenerate the API keys for the blockchain member.

BlockchainMember.description: Payload of the blockchain member which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

properties.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member properties.

sku.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member Sku.

BlockchainMemberProperties.description: Payload of the blockchain member properties for a blockchain member.

protocol.description: Gets or sets the blockchain protocol.

validatorNodesSku.description: Gets or sets the blockchain validator nodes Sku.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member provision state.

dns.description: Gets the dns endpoint of the blockchain member.

userName.description: Gets the auth user name of the blockchain member.

password.description: Sets the basic auth password of the blockchain member.

consortium.description: Gets or sets the consortium for the blockchain member.

consortiumManagementAccountAddress.description: Gets the managed consortium management account address.

consortiumManagementAccountPassword.description: Sets the managed consortium management account password.

consortiumRole.description: Gets the role of the member in the consortium.

consortiumMemberDisplayName.description: Gets the display name of the member in the consortium.

rootContractAddress.description: Gets the Ethereum root contract address of the blockchain.

publicKey.description: Gets the public key of the blockchain member (default transaction node).

BlockchainMemberUpdate.description: Update the payload of the blockchain member which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

tags.description: Tags of the service which is a list of key value pairs that describes the resource.

properties.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member update properties.

BlockchainMemberPropertiesUpdate.description: Update the payload of the blockchain member properties for a blockchain member.

consortiumManagementAccountPassword.description: Sets the managed consortium management account password.

BlockchainMemberNodesSku.description: Payload of the blockchain member nodes Sku for a blockchain member.

capacity.description: Gets or sets the nodes capacity.

ruleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the firewall rules.

startIpAddress.description: Gets or sets the start IP address of the firewall rule range.

endIpAddress.description: Gets or sets the end IP address of the firewall rule range.

BlockchainMemberCollection.description: Collection of the blockchain member payload which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

value.description: Gets or sets the collection of blockchain members.

nextLink.description:
Gets or sets the URL, that the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

value.description: Gets or sets the collection of consortiums.

nextLink.description:
Gets or sets the URL, that the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

displayName.description: Gets the consortium member display name.

subscriptionId.description: Gets the consortium member subscription id.

joinDate.description: Gets the consortium member join date.

dateModified.description: Gets the consortium member modified date.

ApiKeyCollection.description: Collection of the API key payload which is exposed in the response of the resource provider.

keys.description: Gets or sets the collection of API key.

ApiKey.description: API key payload which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

keyName.description: Gets or sets the API key name.

value.description: Gets or sets the API key value.

OperationResult.description: Operation result payload which is exposed in the response of the resource provider.

name.description: Gets or sets the operation name.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the operation start time.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the operation end time.

NameAvailabilityRequest.description: Name availability request payload which is exposed in the request of the resource provider.

name.description: Gets or sets the name to check.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource to check.

NameAvailability.description: Name availability payload which is exposed in the response of the resource provider.

nameAvailable.description: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the name is available.

reason.description: Gets or sets the name availability reason.

value.description: Gets or sets the collection of consortiums.

name.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member name.

protocol.description: Gets or sets the protocol for the consortium.

ResourceProviderOperationCollection.description: Collection of operation payload which is exposed in the response of the resource provider.

value.description: Gets or sets the collection of operations.

nextLink.description:
Gets or sets the URL, that the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

ResourceProviderOperation.description: Operation payload which is exposed in the response of the resource provider.

name.description: Gets or sets the operation name.

isDataAction.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the operation is a data action or not.

ResourceProviderOperationDisplay.description: Operation display payload which is exposed in the response of the resource provider.

provider.description: Gets or sets the name of the provider for display purposes.

resource.description: Gets or sets the name of the resource type for display purposes.

operation.description: Gets or sets the name of the operation for display purposes.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the provider for display purposes.

TransactionNode.description: Payload of the transaction node which is the request/response of the resource provider.

location.description: Gets or sets the transaction node location.

properties.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member properties.

TransactionNodeProperties.description: Payload of transaction node properties payload in the transaction node payload.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member provision state.

dns.description: Gets or sets the transaction node dns endpoint.

userName.description: Gets or sets the transaction node dns endpoint basic auth user name.

password.description: Sets the transaction node dns endpoint basic auth password.

firewallRules.description: Gets or sets the firewall rules.

properties.description: Gets or sets the transaction node update properties.

TransactionNodePropertiesUpdate.description: Update the payload of the transaction node properties in the transaction node payload.

password.description: Sets the transaction node dns endpoint basic auth password.

firewallRules.description: Gets or sets the firewall rules.

TransactionNodeCollection.description: Collection of transaction node payload which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

value.description: Gets or sets the collection of transaction nodes.

nextLink.description:
Gets or sets the URL, that the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a top level resource.

location.description: The GEO location of the blockchain service.

tags.description: Tags of the service which is a list of key value pairs that describes the resource.

Resource.description: The core properties of the resources.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id of the resource.

type.description: The type of the service - e.g. "Microsoft.Blockchain"

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets the subscription Id which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID is part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
